about:
I am Rupapriya Naskar, an Integrated Dual Degree (B.Tech + M.Tech) student in Aerospace Engineering at IIT Kharagpur with a strong focus on Machine Learning, NLP, and Data Science.

My work spans both research and applied development. I have completed internships at National University of Singapore, Chi SquareX, and IIT Kharagpur, where I worked on multilingual preference modeling, credit risk classification, and climate diffusion modeling for long-horizon sea surface temperature generation.

I enjoy building end-to-end ML systems, from data preparation and model development to evaluation and deployment. My core stack includes Python, PyTorch, scikit-learn, LangChain, Docker, AWS, and GitHub Actions.

I am actively seeking opportunities in Machine Learning and Data Science where I can contribute to impactful, real-world AI solutions.
